content: up 1 stitch in the garter ridge bump along the side do not turn work i-cord bobble as follows rotate 90° and pick up 1 stitch in each of the 2 cast-on with mc and ws facing cable co 3 stitches stitches 5 stitches turn k2 k2tog-tbl s3 stitches back to lhn repeat from * until 4 stitches remain set-up row ws k1 kfb pm p1 pm kfb k1 2 stitches increased 7 stitches next row k2tog-tbl k2tog-tbl s2 stitches back to the lhn last row k2tog-tbl 1 stitch remains shawl body break the yarn leaving at least a 5 /13cm tail pull it through your last live stitch and pull tight to close it continuing with mc work row 1 & 2 as follows row 1 rs k1 kfb k to marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l finishing k until 2 stitches remain kfb k1 4 stitches increased row 2 ws k1 kfb k to marker sm p1 sm k until 2 weave in ends to ws wet block to finished measurements stitches remain kfb k1 2 stitches increased and dry flat join in cc and work row 3 & 4 as follows row 3 rs k1 kfb k to marker m1r sm s1wyib sm m1l k until 2 stitches remain kfb k1 4 stitches increased row 4 ws k1 kfb k to marker sm s1wyif sm k until 2 stitches remain kfb k1 2 stitches increased do not cut either yarn you will continue alternating be- tween mc and cc while carrying each yarn up the side of the shawl continuing to use mc and cc where indicated repeat row 1-4 29 more times 348 stitches increased 367 stitches cut both mc and cc leaving long enough tails to weave in 2 visit follow share visit us follow us share with us 740 winslow way east #thelambandkid bainbridge island wa @thelambandkid and www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid #duetshawl the lamb & kid duet shawl version 1 // ©2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission
